title: TEMPLATE Miniature book Grinch | PDF
description: The book is designed for paper weight 80 gsm. Examples were printed on self-adhesive photo paper with a density of 80 g/m2 in the mode for printing photographs with the highest quality on an inkjet printer. If you use thicker paper, there is a chance that the book will not close. Therefore, I recommend that you use a hair straightening iron.Please note that the templates are made in 1:12 scale and do not have other sizes. When printed, the text is practically unreadable.
